verses.name: Genesis 29:29
verses.text: And Laban gave to Rachel his daughter Bilhah his handmaid to be her maid.

verses.name: Genesis 29:30
verses.text: And he went in also unto Rachel, and he loved also Rachel more than Leah, and served with him yet seven other years.

verses.name: Genesis 29:31
verses.text: And when the Lord saw that Leah was hated, he opened her womb: but Rachel was barren.

verses.name: Genesis 29:32
verses.text: And Leah conceived, and bare a son, and she called his name Reuben: for she said, Surely the Lord hath looked upon my affliction; now therefore my husband will love me.
